it.unimi.di.law.warc.records

Class WarcHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.message.BasicHeader
      • it.unimi.di.law.warc.records.WarcHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Header

    public class WarcHeader
extends BasicHeader
    A class used to represent WARC headers, with a set of static methods to handle them.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      An enumeration of WARC headers.

                   WarcHeader.Name name,
                   String value)
        Adds the given header, if not present (otherwise does nothing).
        Parameters:
        headers - the headers where to add the new one.
        name - the name of the header to add.
        value - the value of the header to add.
